import heapq

# Input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Sort A in ascending order
A.sort()

# If N is smaller than A[-1], Takahashi cannot finish all of the tasks
if N < A[-1]:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Initialize a heap
h = []

# Put the last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-1])

# Put the second-last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-2])

# Repeat M-2 times
for i in range(M-2):
    # Pop the largest element in the heap
    a = -heapq.heappop(h)

    # If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the tasks
    if a > N:
        print(-1)
        exit()

    # Push a-1 into the heap
    heapq.heappush(h, -(a-1))

# Pop the largest element in the heap
a = -heapq.heappop(h)

# If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the tasks
if a > N:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Print N-(a-1)
print(N-(a-1))

import heapq

# Input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Sort A in ascending order
A.sort()

# If N is smaller than A[-1], Takahashi cannot finish all of the assignments on time
if N < A[-1]:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Initialize a heap
h = []

# Put the last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-1])

# Put the second-last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-2])

# Repeat M-2 times
for i in range(M-2):
    # Pop the largest element in the heap
    a = -heapq.heappop(h)

    # If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the assignments on time
    if a > N:
        print(-1)
        exit()

    # Push a-1 into the heap
    heapq.heappush(h, -(a-1))

# Pop the largest element in the heap
a = -heapq.heappop(h)

# If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the assignments
if a > N:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Print N-a
print(N-a)

import heapq

# Input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Sort A in ascending order
A.sort()

# If N is smaller than A[-1], Takahashi cannot finish all of the assignments in time
if N < A[-1] - 1:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Initialize a heap
h = []

# Put the last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-1])

# Put the second-last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-2])

# Repeat M-2 times
for i in range(M-2):
    # Pop the largest element in the heap
    a = -heapq.heappop(h)

    # If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the assignments in time
    if a > N + 1:
        print(-1)
        exit()

    # Push a-1 into the heap
    heapq.heappush(h, -(a-1))

# Pop the largest element in the heap
a = -heapq.heappop(h)

# If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the assignments
if a > N + 1:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Print N-(a-1)
print(N-(a-1))


n, m = map(int, input().split())  # число полок и число книг
a = list(map(int, input().split()))  # количество страниц в книге
a.sort(reverse=True)
if a[-1] > n:
    print(-1)
    exit()

s = 0
for i in range(m):
    s += a[i]

print(n - s)

import heapq

# Input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))[:M]

# Sort A in ascending order
A.sort()

# If N is smaller than A[-1], Takahashi cannot finish all of the tasks
if N < A[-1]:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Initialize a heap
h = []

# Put the last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-1])

# Put the second-last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-2])

# Repeat M-2 times
for i in range(M-2):
    # Pop the largest element in the heap
    a = -heapq.heappop(h)

    # If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the tasks
    if a > N:
        print(-1)
        exit()

    # Push a-1 into the heap
    heapq.heappush(h, -(a-1))

# Pop the largest element in the heap
a = -heapq.heappop(h)

# If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the tasks
if a > N:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Print N-(a-1)
print(N-(a-1))

n, m = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.sort()

if a[-1] > n:
    print(-1)
    exit()

s = 0
for i in range(m):
    s += a[i]

print(n - s)

print(n - s)

import heapq

# Input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Sort A in ascending order
A.sort()

# If N is smaller than A[-1], Takahashi cannot finish all of the assignments
if N < A[-1]:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Initialize a heap
h = []

# Put the last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-1])

# Put the second-last element of A into the heap
heapq.heappush(h, -A[-2])

# Repeat M-2 times
for i in range(M-2):
    # Pop the largest element in the heap
    a = -heapq.heappop(h)

    # If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the assignments
    if a > N:
        print(-1)
        exit()

    # Push a-1 into the heap
    heapq.heappush(h, -(a-1))

# Pop the largest element in the heap
a = -heapq.heappop(h)

# If a is greater than N, Takahashi cannot finish all of the assignments
if a > N:
    print(-1)
    exit()

# Print N-(a-1)
print(N-(a-1))

n, m = map(int, input().split())  # число полок и число книг
a = list(map(int, input().split()))  # количество страниц в книге

a.sort(reverse=True)

if a[-1] > n:
    print(-1)
    exit()

s = 0
for i in range(m):
    s += a[i]

print(n - s)
